channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I feel like I’m missing something’: I’m 68, divorced with two children. I’ve $750,000 and rent my home. Do I need a trust?
item.description: “I continue to reinvest the dividends and interest so my investments continue to grow.”

item.title: How open-source LLMs enable security teams to stay ahead of evolving threats
item.description: Open-source LLMs are revolutionizing cybersecurity, serving as a strong catalyst for increasing innovation.

item.description: The companies plan to produce a fleet of IONIQ 5 robotaxis equipped with Waymo’s technology to support Waymo One’s growth. The post Waymo adds Hyundai...

item.title: ‘We didn’t sign an exclusive listing’: A realtor said she’d take out an ad to rent my New York City apartment. Am I morally obligated to use her?
item.description: “Other agents know our apartment is available for rent and now want to show it.”

item.title: Skeptical about AI? It’s normal (and healthy)
item.description: Skepticism should be in every employee manual to ensure new technologies are vetted responsibly without unnecessary alarm.

item.title: Why MFA alone won’t protect you in the age of adversarial AI
item.description: While MFA is still critical in identity verification, experts say it should be just a small piece of the authentication process.

item.title: XTEND drones rapidly evolve to support defense missions

item.title: Meta enters AI video wars with powerful Movie Gen set to hit Instagram in 2025
item.description: It can make both video and audio from text prompts, and allow users to customize their own videos, adding special effects, props, costumes.

item.title: ‘I’m scared to death’: My wife asked for a divorce after 21 years. She wants to buy a house with our savings, but promises to help pay my mortgage.
item.description: “There is more than enough money in the savings to completely pay off the current mortgage.”

item.title: ‘Their house was purchased with my family money’: My late father left a life estate to his second wife. She’s only 10 years older than me. How can I undo this?
item.description: “Apparently the probate laws in Florida are different, perhaps superseding the will.”

item.title: ‘He’s 70 and fairly wealthy’: I met the love of my life three years ago. How do I politely ask that he include me in his will?
item.description: “His two sons are against any kind of commitment between us, as their dad has had two failed marriages.”

item.title: People are using Google study software to make AI podcasts—and they’re weird and amazing
